titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 300) to amend title II of the Social Security Act to eliminate the earnings test for individuals who have attained retirement age.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Mr. Hastert. Petition No: 103-18.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1100)

bill.summary: 4/12/1994--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 300 (amending title II of the Social Security Act to eliminate the earnings test for individuals who have attained retirement age).
